amendment.description: Relating to the review of the status of detainees of the United States Government.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2515 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2515 proposed by Senator Graham. (consideration: CR S12655-12661, S12662-12665; text: CR S12655) Relating to the review of the status of detainees of the United States Government.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2515 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2515 proposed by Senator Graham.
